summary: Code navigates to the "free-img" directory, sets the PICTURE variable to a specific image path, and runs the Python script "cli/free-img.py" with options "-s gtimg" and "-i $PICTURE", which uploads an image to the "gtimg" server using the specified picture.

details.comment: Code navigates to the "free-img" directory, sets the PICTURE variable to a specific image path, and runs the Python script "cli/free-img.py" with options "-s gtimg" and "-i $PICTURE", which uploads an image to the "gtimg" server using the specified picture.
